recovery_codes.title: Set up two-factor recovery codes
recovery_codes.description: In the event that you lose access to your device and cannot use the two-factor authentication codes, you can use a recovery code to gain access to your account.

empty.alert: No recovery codes were generated for this account yet

query.error: There was an error generating recovery codes

exists.title: Your recovery codes
exists.alert: Make sure you save these codes in a safe place. If you lose access to your device and the codes, you will be permanently locked out of your account.

generate.title: Generate new recovery codes
generate.description: Generating a new set of recovery codes will invalidate your old codes, meaning you will need to save them again.

totp.title: Set up two-factor authentication
totp.description: Improve the security of your account in three easy steps by enabling two-factor authentication.

empty.alert: You must generate a set of recovery codes before you can set up two-factor authentication

configured.description: You're about to reconfigure your two-factor authentication device. This will invalidate your current two-factor device configuration.

app_step.title: Download an Authenticator App
app_step.description: Install an authenticator app for your mobile device.

scan_step.title: Scan the QR Code
scan_step.description: Open the authenticator app and scan the image. You must scan the code through the app or it won't work.
scan_step.alternative: Alternatively, you can enter the following secret code into the app

code_step.title: Enter the code
code_step.description: Enter the 6-digit verification code that the authenticator app generated.

query.success: Two-factor authentication was successfully set up

error.message: There was an error setting up two-factor authentication
error.INVALID_CODE: The code you entered is invalid. Try another one?

validation.length: The code must be 6 digits long
validation.pattern: The code can only contain numbers

success.title: You have successfully set up two-factor authentication!
success.description: The next time you login, you'll be asked to enter another 6-digit code using the same device you used to set this up.
